title: Worked Solution
text:
First, we distribute the coefficients and simplify each side of the equation:

8q + $$8$$ - $$5$$ $$=$$ 6q - $$12$$ - $$1$$

Simplifying further, we combine like terms and simplify:

8q + $$3$$ $$=$$ 6q - $$13$$

Subtracting 6q from both sides, we get:

2q + $$3$$ $$=$$ $$-13$$

Subtracting $$3$$ from both sides, we get:

2q $$=$$ $$-16$$

Finally, dividing both sides by $$2$$, we get:

q $$=$$ $$-8$$

Therefore, the solution to the equation is q $$=$$ $$-8$$.
